title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Lebanon: A Detailed Review of the Overnight Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked targets of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanon, including a weapons depot and a site for the production of combat materials of the organization.

Fighter jets attacked a short time ago a weapons depot and military buildings of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Ramiya area in southern Lebanon.

During the night, the IDF struck a site for the production of combat materials of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Harbath Salem area.

Following the alarms activated in the Kiryat Shmona area, about ten launches from Lebanese territory crossed into Israeli territory, air defenders intercepted a number of launches successfully. The IDF attacked the firing sources in Lebanese territory.

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/42XPr5I
